recordWater: Record daily water intake and track
passwordTooShort: Must be at least 5 characters long
passwordTooLong: Must be no more than 25 characters
repeatPasswordMustMatch: There must be the same value as in the password field
editWaterAmount: Edit the entered amount of water
enterWaterValue: Enter the value of the water used:
waterValueGreater: Water value must be greater than or equal to 50
waterValueLess: Water value must be less than or equal to 5000
formulaExplanation: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
activeSportsTime: The time of active participation in sports:
requiredWaterAmount: The required amount of water in liters per day:
recordWaterIntake: Write down how much water you will drink:
nameMaxCharacters: Your name should not exceed 10 characters
weightValueLess: Weight value must be less than or equal to 300
activeSportTime: Active sports time value must be less than or equal to 12
dailyWaterConsumption: Daily water consumption value must be less than or equal to 8
confirmDeleteEntry: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
confirmLogout: Do you really want to leave?
noWaterAdded: Water has not been added yet
waterMonthErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please reload the page
closeLogOutModal: Close the log out modal window
closeDeleteEntryModal: Close the delete entry modal window
openCloseUserPanel: Open or close the user panel
editWaterAmountArea: Edit the entered amount of water
deleteWaterAmount: Delete the entered amount of water
viewPreviousMonthEntries: View entries for the previous month
viewNextMonthEntries: View entries for the next month
greatingP: We are glad to have you here!
first-step: This is your daily water intake target.
second-step: This is your water progress bar.
third-step: Click here to add more water to your daily intake.
fourth-step: Here you can use your profile settings to fill in your personal details and record your daily water intake.
fifth-step: This section shows how much water you have drunk today, including the quantity and the times.
sixth-step: Here you can view your monthly water intake statistics, where each individual day is taken into account.
endingH: We hope you enjoy using AquaTrack!
